trans-unit.source: Connect computers directly to Operational Insights
trans-unit.target: Connect computers directly to Operational Insights

trans-unit.source: You can connect computers directly to Operational Insights by installing the Operational Insights agent to each computer you want to on board.
trans-unit.target: You can connect computers directly to Operational Insights by installing the Operational Insights agent to each computer you want to on board.

trans-unit.source: Connect computers directly to Operational Insights
trans-unit.target: Connect computers directly to Operational Insights

trans-unit.source: You can connect computers directly to Operational Insights by installing the Operational Insights agent on each computer you want to on board.
trans-unit.target: You can connect computers directly to Operational Insights by installing the Operational Insights agent on each computer you want to on board.

trans-unit.source: For virtual machines running in Azure, install the agent by following the steps in <link><linkText>Analyze data from servers in Microsoft Azure</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: For virtual machines running in Azure, install the agent by following the steps in <link><linkText>Analyze data from servers in Microsoft Azure</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Download and install the agent
trans-unit.target: Download and install the agent

trans-unit.source: Use the following procedures to download and install the Operational Insights agent.
trans-unit.target: Use the following procedures to download and install the Operational Insights agent.

trans-unit.source: To download the agent setup file
trans-unit.target: To download the agent setup file

trans-unit.source: In the Operational Insights portal, on the Overview page, click the Settings tile.
trans-unit.target: In the Operational Insights portal, on the Overview page, click the Settings tile.

trans-unit.source: Click the Connected Sources tab at the top.
trans-unit.target: Click the Connected Sources tab at the top.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>settings page</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>settings page</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Under Attach Servers Directly (64 bit), click the Download Agent button to download the setup file.
trans-unit.target: Under Attach Servers Directly (64 bit), click the Download Agent button to download the setup file.

trans-unit.source: On the right of the Workspace ID, click the copy icon and paste the ID into Notepad.
trans-unit.target: On the right of the Workspace ID, click the copy icon and paste the ID into Notepad.

trans-unit.source: On the right of the Primary Key, click the copy icon and paste the ID into Notepad.
trans-unit.target: On the right of the Primary Key, click the copy icon and paste the ID into Notepad.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>settings page</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>settings page</linkText>

trans-unit.source: To install agent using setup
trans-unit.target: To install agent using setup

trans-unit.source: Run Setup to install the agent on a computer that you want to manage.
trans-unit.target: Run Setup to install the agent on a computer that you want to manage.

trans-unit.source: Select Connect the agent to Microsoft Azure Operational Insights and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: Select Connect the agent to Microsoft Azure Operational Insights and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: When prompted, enter the Workspace ID and Primary Key that you copied into Notepad in the previous procedure.
trans-unit.target: When prompted, enter the Workspace ID and Primary Key that you copied into Notepad in the previous procedure.

trans-unit.source: Click Next.
trans-unit.target: Click Next.

trans-unit.source: The agent verifies that it can connect to Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: The agent verifies that it can connect to Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: When complete, the Microsoft Management Agent appears in Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: When complete, the Microsoft Management Agent appears in Control Panel.

trans-unit.source: To install agent using the command line
trans-unit.target: To install agent using the command line

trans-unit.source: Modify and then use the following example to install the agent using the command line.
trans-unit.target: Modify and then use the following example to install the agent using the command line.

trans-unit.source: MMASetup-AMD64.exe /C:"setup.exe /qn ADD_OPINSIGHTS_WORKSPACE=1 OPINSIGHTS_WORKSPACE_ID= OPINSIGHTS_WORKSPACE_KEY= AcceptEndUserLicenseAgreement=1"
trans-unit.target: MMASetup-AMD64.exe /C:"setup.exe /qn ADD_OPINSIGHTS_WORKSPACE=1 OPINSIGHTS_WORKSPACE_ID= OPINSIGHTS_WORKSPACE_KEY= AcceptEndUserLicenseAgreement=1"

trans-unit.source: Configure the Microsoft Monitoring Agent (optional)
trans-unit.target: Configure the Microsoft Monitoring Agent (optional)

trans-unit.source: Use the following information to enable an agent to communicate directly with the Microsoft Azure Operational Insights service.
trans-unit.target: Use the following information to enable an agent to communicate directly with the Microsoft Azure Operational Insights service.

trans-unit.source: After you've configured the agent, it will register with the agent service and will get necessary configuration information and management packs that contain solution information.
trans-unit.target: After you've configured the agent, it will register with the agent service and will get necessary configuration information and management packs that contain solution information.

trans-unit.source: After data is collected from computers monitored by the agent, the number of computers monitored will appear in the Operational Insights portal in the Connected Sources tab in Settings under Attach Servers Directly (64 bit).
trans-unit.target: After data is collected from computers monitored by the agent, the number of computers monitored will appear in the Operational Insights portal in the Connected Sources tab in Settings under Attach Servers Directly (64 bit).

trans-unit.source: For any computer that sends data, you can view its data and assessment information in the Operational Insights portal.
trans-unit.target: For any computer that sends data, you can view its data and assessment information in the Operational Insights portal.

trans-unit.source: You can also disable the agent, if needed or you enable it using the command line or script.
trans-unit.target: You can also disable the agent, if needed or you enable it using the command line or script.

trans-unit.source: To configure the agent
trans-unit.target: To configure the agent

trans-unit.source: After you've installed the Microsoft Monitoring Agent, open Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: After you've installed the Microsoft Monitoring Agent, open Control Panel.

trans-unit.source: Open Microsoft Monitoring Agent and then click the Azure Operational Insights tab.
trans-unit.target: Open Microsoft Monitoring Agent and then click the Azure Operational Insights tab.

trans-unit.source: Select Connect to Azure Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: Select Connect to Azure Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: In the Workspace ID box, paste the Workspace ID from the Operational Insights portal.
trans-unit.target: In the Workspace ID box, paste the Workspace ID from the Operational Insights portal.

trans-unit.source: In the Account Key box, paste the Primary Key from the Operational Insights portal and then click OK.
trans-unit.target: In the Account Key box, paste the Primary Key from the Operational Insights portal and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: To disable an agent
trans-unit.target: To disable an agent

trans-unit.source: After installing the agent, open Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: After installing the agent, open Control Panel.

trans-unit.source: Open Microsoft Monitoring Agent and then click the Azure Operational Insights tab.
trans-unit.target: Open Microsoft Monitoring Agent and then click the Azure Operational Insights tab.

trans-unit.source: Clear Connect to Azure Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: Clear Connect to Azure Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: To Enable the agent using the command line or script
trans-unit.target: To Enable the agent using the command line or script

trans-unit.source: You can use either Windows PowerShell or a VB script with the following example.
trans-unit.target: You can use either Windows PowerShell or a VB script with the following example.

trans-unit.source: Configure proxy and firewall settings (optional)
trans-unit.target: Configure proxy and firewall settings (optional)

trans-unit.source: If you have proxy servers or firewalls in your environment that restrict access to the Internet, you might need to follow the following procedures to enable Operations Manager or agents to communicate to the Operational Insights service.
trans-unit.target: If you have proxy servers or firewalls in your environment that restrict access to the Internet, you might need to follow the following procedures to enable Operations Manager or agents to communicate to the Operational Insights service.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Configure proxy and firewall settings (Optional)</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Configure proxy and firewall settings (Optional)</linkText><title></title></link>
